Text: If I get at least 6 seeders, I will upload the DVD quality of season 1, I would prefer more, but I'm just asking for at least the number of leechers I have currently

I am currently leaving my PC seeding all day, until I get more seeders. If I get at least 6 seeders on each of the seasons, I will upload DVD quality of seasons 1-3, I also have DVD quality of 4-5, I will upload those, as soon as I get sufficient seeders for the first 3 DVD quality seasons.

If everyone really wants me to, I could get individual episodes, really all you have to do though, to get them that way, is to download videopad, and split the video, where the episode ends. I have videopad uploaded if you want to check it out
Season 1 on DVD is currently up, please seed if you can download it, it is fairly new, so it might take a bit to download. But it is completely ripped off the dvd.
i really like how this is one big video for season 1 and not separate videos.
